name: part_011
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ1周年記念ライブ】シャチ出没中【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [YOnasn4-BH0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe performing a cover of 'Story' by AI during her 1st Anniversary Live.
Instrumental outro with ending credits and illustrations.

subtitles.original: 疲れた時は 肩をかすから
subtitles.english: When you're tired, I'll lend you my shoulder.
No matter how much you try to be strong,

subtitles.original: ため息くらいする時もある
subtitles.english: there are times you might let out a sigh.
Even a door that is too heavy to open alone,

subtitles.original: 共に立ち上がればまた動き始める
subtitles.english: if we stand up together, it will start to move again.

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないから 私がキミを守るから
subtitles.english: You're not alone, because I'll be there to protect you.

subtitles.original: あなたの笑う顔が見たいと思うから
subtitles.english: Because I want to see your smiling face.

subtitles.original: 時がなだめてく 痛みと共に流れてく
subtitles.english: Time will soothe the pain as it flows away.

subtitles.original: 日の光がやさしく照らしてくれる
subtitles.english: The sunlight will gently shine upon you.

subtitles.original: 時には人は傷付き、傷付けながら
subtitles.english: Sometimes people get hurt, and hurt others,

subtitles.original: 染まる色はそれぞれ違うけど
subtitles.english: and we all turn out different colors.

subtitles.original: 自分だけのStory 作りながら生きてくの
subtitles.english: But we keep living, creating our own unique story.

subtitles.original: だからずっと ずっと あきらめないで
subtitles.english: So please, don't ever, ever give up.

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないから 私がキミを守るから
subtitles.english: You're not alone, because I'll be there to protect you.

subtitles.original: あなたの笑う顔が見たいと思うから
subtitles.english: Because I want to see your smiling face.

subtitles.original: 時がなだめてく 痛みと共に流れてく
subtitles.english: Time will soothe the pain as it flows away.

subtitles.original: 日の光がやさしく照らしてくれる
subtitles.english: The sunlight will gently shine upon you.
